title: apple clone
description: Landing page with a high level of performance, fully responsive, image optimization, beautiful animation, simple and beautiful design with dark mode.
features: Compatible with all devices such as mobile
Compatible with all browsers such as Chrome and Firefox
how_to_use: You Need To Setup [ nodejs, gulp ] on your machine
npm start or npm run start

title: agency
description: Responsive SPA website with high level of performance, simple design, using React, React router, Sass.
features: Hight level of quality in every small peace of the website
Two themes of colors [ Light theme & Dark theme ]
Dynamic theme depend on user preference
Compatible with all devices such as mobile
Compatible with all browsers such as Chrome and Firefox
Every thing is dynamic by using an restful API ( Application Programming Interface )
Contact form for sending messages connected with json-server
Navbar with modern features such a [ close when click on any place in the document - close with ESC button - etc... ]
SVGs Images that have a good quality & low size
Powerful slider for team section [ Swiper.js ]
how_to_use: You Need To Setup [ nodejs, gulp ] on your machine
npm start or npm run start
Add / in the last of url => http://localhost:3000/Agency/
